DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, gain %1$s Block.

At the end of this turn, gain %1$s Strength.

Augury.NAME: Augury
DESCRIPTIONS: Instead of drawing your hand at the beginning of your turn, choose
cards from your draw pile. Cards drawn by other sources behave normally.
